Description.Text: The property is centrally located on Queens Road overlooking the picturesque Albert Park Lake the renowned Formula 1 Australian Grand Prix track and situated adjacent to parks sporting facilities and a golf course. The property is one of Melbourne's largest conference and event centres. Choose from 28 function rooms with over 2600 square metres of space with a seating capacity of up to 1400 guests.
Rooms at Pullman Melbourne Albert Park are stylish and have a modern bathroom. Many overlook Albert Park or Port Phillip Bay.

The hotel features a restaurant and an atrium bar.
